name: You're Bacon-Me Crazy
author: Twiggycdxx
summary: This is my favorite dip recipe and I have brought it to many family functions and parties!
ingredients: 1 pound bacon, sliced crosswise into 1/2-inch pieces
1 (18 ounce) package scoop-shaped tortilla chips (such as Fritos® Scoops®)
directions: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels until cool
Stir sour cream, ranch dressing, and Cheddar cheese together in a large bowl
Crumble bacon into the dip; mix well
Chill until flavors blend, about 1 hour
